text:
Hello! Is there any easy way to specify the "maintainer version" of BinaryBuilder packages in the [compat] section of Project.toml?
I'd love to do something like
```Package_jll = "^1.2.0+1"```
but that doesn't parse for me

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
No, the build number can't be used, unfortunately

elements.text: No, the build number can't be used, unfortunately

text: The largest number will always be installed. Just use 1.2.0
